text: Those who act niggardly (in spending of what God has granted them) and urge others to be niggardly: whoever turns away (from carrying out Godâ€™s command to spend in His cause and for the needy), then surely God is All-Wealthy and Self-Sufficient (absolutely independent of all His creatures), All-Praiseworthy (as your Lord, Who provides for you and the needs of all other beings)
